titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation and goals of "National Health Information Technology Week" for the period beginning on September 21, 2009, and ending on September 25, 2009.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
9/23/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates September 21-25, 2009, as National Health Information Technology Week.
Recognizes the value of information technology and management systems in transforming health care.
Calls on all stakeholders to promote the use of information technology and management systems to transform the health care system in the United States.
